about_the_game:
This DLC will add high resolution images to the game directory for you to enjoy on your computer or use to create dakimakura body pillows of the character Ophelia. Once installed it will be available in the game directory in a folder named 'Dakimakuras'.

This pack include four Ophelia Dakimakura Images:
Two are nude versions and two are clothed.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC includes Nude Images of Women in suggestive poses. All characters depicted are over 18 years of age.

detailed_description:

This pack include four Ophelia Dakimakura Images:
Two are nude versions and two are clothed.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4k
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4k
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Witches Brew - Ophelia Dakimakura
